title: Bug 17289 Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo "Host:".
EB: The focus caret should appear in the first Combo "Host:" after clicking on it.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate the first Combo.
3. Click on the first Combo.
4. Verify that the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo "Host:".
